summary: Tenchi and co. find their existence unsettled by a time-travelling entity called Kain. Desiring revenge upon the Juraian emperor, Tenchi, Kain travels back in time to kill Tenchi's mother. ... See full summary »
cast: Matt K. Miller|Megumi Hayashibara|Yuri Amano|Takeshi Aono|Petrea Burchard|Jennifer Darling|John DeMita|Debi Derryberry|Eddie Frierson|Ellen Gerstell|Jay Hopper|Masami Kikuchi|Yûko Kobayashi|Etsuko Kozakura|Sherry Lynn|Yûko Mizutani|Toshiyuki Morikawa|Ai Orikasa|Andrew Philpot|Michael Scott Ryan|Yumi Takada|K.T. Vogt|Chisa Yokoyama|Grace Zandarski|Ryûzaburô Ôtomo
title: Tenchi-Muyo!: La película 1 - Tenchi enamorado
